name: Avoider 2D
description:
Avoider 2D is a challenging avoidance platformer, please help the little green robot to escape from a place full of deadly traps. The key is to win this game how good are you control the jump button and landing on the ground.
GAME FEATURES:
30 levels.
Gamepad supported.
Auto Save Level Progress.
Retro Pixel Graphic.
Retro-style platform gameplay.
